Iris Cabral (1906 - June 1936) bụ onye Afro-Uruguayan na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-arụ ọrụ.
.Cabral haziri otu ndị ọrụ ụlọ mbụ na Uruguay

N'afọ 1930 ya na Clementina Silva tọrọ ntọala kọmitii Anti-Fascist mbụ nke Uruguay.  Ya na Maruja Pereyra bụ ndị "ndị a na-ahụ anya, ndị agha na ndị nkwuwa okwu" nyere aka na akwụkwọ Afro-Uruguayan Nuestra Raza mgbe ọ maliteghachiri na 1933
Ma Cabral na Pereyra sonyere na April 1936 National Congress of Women
Otú ọ dị, Cabral nwụrụ na June 1936.

Pereyra chetara Cabral n'ụzọ dị mma:
 
N'afọ 2016, ndị omeiwu nke Montevideo kwanyeere ncheta Cabral ùgwù.
